casebody.data:
Jason MILLER
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided April 18, 2017

Alan Jay Black, in support of the petition.

Lisa A. Riggione, senior assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Jason Miller's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 171 Conn.App. 901, 155 A.3d 1282 (2017), is denied.

ESPINOSA, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
